# The package `straightline`

This simple package is an example package. It has a few simple functions, dependencies, vignette, test files and example data.



# Function `straighten`

Example of function `straighten`:

```{r}
library(straightline)
line <- straighten(2, 1, 5)
print(class(line))
print(line)
```
